articles.title: Trump’s new tariffs go into effect as US economy shows signs of strain - AP News
articles.description: Global financial markets are reacting to President Donald Trump's tariff adjustments. Markets rose across much of Europe and Asia, while stocks are slipping on Wall Street. Trump started imposing higher import taxes on goods from more than 60 countries, inclu…
articles.content: WASHINGTON (AP) President Donald Trump began imposing higher import taxes on dozens of countries Thursday just as the economic fallout of his monthslong tariff threats has begun to cause visible dama… [+5472 chars]

articles.title: Hubble Space Telescope takes best picture yet of the comet visiting from another solar system - AP News
articles.description: The Hubble Space Telescope has captured the best picture yet of a high-speed comet visiting our solar system from another star. NASA and the European Space Agency released the latest photos Thursday. The interstellar comet was discovered last month by a teles…
